paragraphs.text:
What is it:
Extract useful patterns from data.
How:
Neural network + optimization
How (Practical):
Python + TensorFlow & friends
Hard Part:
Good Questions + Good Data
Why now:
Data, hardware, community, tools,
investment
where do we stand?
Most big questions of intelligence
have not been answered nor
properly formulated
